description:
Having tyrant blood within my heart, thus entering the supremacy of evolution. Chen Ju, who is hopeless to test the undergraduate course, opened a mystical blood jade and obtained an antiquite ominous monster from accident.

_______

The practice of mosquito magical arts has taken the path of peerless evolution. And from then on with my racing heart I will make evil spirit gods flinche.>
